forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds with a gentle warmth under a sun-drenched sky. As the temperature hovers around a comfortable 65 degrees, moments of brilliance are increasingly contrasting against the cooler winds sweeping in from the west, invigorating the air with refreshing gusts. The clarity of day allows the iconic cityscape to shine with the kind of vibrancy that hints at the pleasures of an urban exploration—perhaps a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, enjoying the subtle transitions of light as the sun begins to lean towards dusk.

As evening approaches, an increasing cloud cover will weave a soft shroud over the city, bringing the temperature down to a mild 56 degrees. While fog may seek to creep inland from the bay, the remnants of sunlight will linger just enough to create a soothing atmosphere. It is advisable to dress in layers, as the cool night air will soon settle in. Consider a light sweater or jacket, perfect for an outdoor café visit or a serene walk through the waterfront. The combination of urban buzz and the calming embrace of twilight beckons an indolent evening—perhaps new favorites to discover in a cozy nook or an impromptu visit to a local gallery, where creativity thrives against the backdrop of a changing city.
